# Release v1.0.0 (Draft)

This is a draft release file for v1.0.0. Use this content to create a GitHub Release manually (or set `GITHUB_TOKEN` and I can create it for you).

## Changelog

See `CHANGELOG.md` for full details.

## Release Notes

- Initial public release with English documentation and API contract.
- Endpoint: `POST /validate`.
- Fields: `first_name`, `last_name`, `email`, `phone`, `age`.
- Automated tests and CI configured.

## How to publish (manual)

1. Go to the repository Releases page: https://github.com/Pantuflito01/API_Validadora-/releases
2. Click "Draft a new release".
3. Tag version: `v1.0.0` (already pushed).
4. Title: "v1.0.0"
5. Paste this file content into the release notes, or attach `CHANGELOG.md`.
6. Publish release.
